#Importando Librerias

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from io import BytesIO
from pdfminer.pdfinterp import PDFResourceManager, PDFPageInterpreter
from pdfminer.pdfpage import PDFPage
from pdfminer.converter import TextConverter
from pdfminer.layout import LAParams, LTTextBoxHorizontal, LTFigure
from pdfminer.converter import PDFPageAggregator
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType, IntegerType, DateType, DoubleType
import io

#Capturar Parametros
pdf_user = "bsmoralesg@outlook.com"
#pdf_type = "Tarjeta Credito"
#pdf_type = "Cuenta Ahorros"
pdf_type = "Fondos de Inversion"
pdf_fecha = "10012023"

#Tarjeta Credito
#file_name = "Extracto_403340132_202305_TARJETA_VISA_2166.pdf"
#file_name = "Extracto_7358651_202108_TARJETA_VISA_2166.pdf"
#file_name = "Extracto_392576648_202304_TARJETA_VISA_2166.pdf"
#file_name = "Extracto_369280261_202303_TARJETA_VISA_2166.pdf"
#file_name = "Extracto_231339919_202209_TARJETA_VISA_2166.pdf"
#file_name = "Extracto_204864725_202207_TARJETA_VISA_2166.pdf"

#Cuenta de Ahorrros

#file_name = "Extracto_49243429_202112_CTA_AHORROS_5557.pdf"
#file_name = "Extracto_240056999_202209_CTA_AHORROS_5557.pdf"
#file_name = "Extracto_307612445_202212_CTA_AHORROS_5557.pdf"
#file_name = "Extracto_375992443_202303_CTA_AHORROS_5557.pdf"

#Fiducuenta

#file_name = "Extracto_8791222_202108_FIDUCUENTA_3940.pdf"
#file_name = "Extracto_36546412_202111_FIDUCUENTA_3940.pdf"
#file_name = "Extracto_212010590_202208_FIDUCUENTA_3940.pdf"
#file_name = "Extracto_254154275_202210_FIDUCUENTA_3940.pdf"
#file_name = "Extracto_333733883_202301_FIDUCUENTA_3940.pdf"
file_name = "Extracto_395097292_202304_FIDUCUENTA_3940.pdf"


pdf_password = "1233491047"

#Consolidar Variables

#Ruta Origen
pdf_path_origin = "abfss://stagefiles@datalakeproyectomaestria.dfs.core.windows.net/"+pdf_user+"/"+pdf_type+"/"+pdf_fecha+"/"+file_name

#Ruta Destino
file_name = file_name.replace(".pdf", "")
path_sink = "abfss://stagedata@datalakeproyectomaestria.dfs.core.windows.net/"+pdf_user+"/"+pdf_type+"/"+pdf_fecha+"/"+file_name+"/Raw"

# Definir estructura para datos crudos

schemarawdata = StructType([
    StructField("index", IntegerType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("pagenumber", IntegerType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("x0", DoubleType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("x1", DoubleType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("y0", DoubleType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("y1", DoubleType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("contenido", StringType(), nullable=True)
])

df_RawDat = spark.createDataFrame([], schemarawdata)
ArrayRawData = []

#Procesar informacion - Capturar informacion


# Leer the PDF file como bytes
pdf_bytes = spark.read \
    .format("binaryFile") \
    .option("path", pdf_path_origin) \
    .load() \
    .select("content") \
    .collect()[0][0]

# crear un BytesIO stream de the PDF bytes
pdf_stream = BytesIO(pdf_bytes)
pdf_stream.seek(0)

# Crear objeto PDFResourceManager y configurar parametros
rsrcmgr = PDFResourceManager()
retstr = io.StringIO()

# Crear Objeto  TextConverter para las paginas dle PDF
laparams = LAParams()
device = TextConverter(rsrcmgr, retstr, laparams=laparams)

# Crear objeto PDFPageInterpreter
interpreter = PDFPageInterpreter(rsrcmgr, device)

# Porcesar cada pagina del archivo PDF
password = pdf_password.encode()
pages = PDFPage.get_pages(pdf_stream, password=password, check_extractable=True)

for page in pages:
    interpreter.process_page(page)

# Obtener el texto extraido del objeto StringIO
pdf_content = retstr.getvalue()

# Cerrar el objeto StringIO
device.close()
retstr.close()

# Leer the PDF file como bytes
pdf_bytes = spark.read \
    .format("binaryFile") \
    .option("path", pdf_path_origin) \
    .load() \
    .select("content") \
    .collect()[0][0]

# crear un BytesIO stream de the PDF bytes
pdf_stream = BytesIO(pdf_bytes)
pdf_stream.seek(0)

# Crear objeto PDFResourceManager y configurar parametros
rsrcmgr = PDFResourceManager()
retstr = io.StringIO()

# Crear Objeto  TextConverter para las paginas dle PDF
laparams = LAParams()
#device = TextConverter(rsrcmgr, retstr, laparams=laparams)
device = PDFPageAggregator(rsrcmgr, laparams=laparams)

# Crear objeto PDFPageInterpreter
interpreter = PDFPageInterpreter(rsrcmgr, device)

# Porcesar cada pagina del archivo PDF
password = pdf_password.encode()
pages = PDFPage.get_pages(pdf_stream, password=password, check_extractable=True)    


#Recorrer las Paginas del PDF 
pageraux = None
pagenumber = 0

for page in pages:
        
        # Process the page

        interpreter.process_page(page)
        layout = device.get_result()

        # Cambiar la pagina
        if (page != pageraux):
            pagenumber = pagenumber + 1
        
        # Iterar por cada elemnto del layout        
        for element in layout:
            if (not isinstance(element, LTFigure)):
                
                index = int(element.index)                
                x0 = float(element.x0)
                x1 = float(element.x1)
                y0 = float(element.y0)
                y1 = float(element.y1)
                contenido = str(element.get_text())
                ArrayRawData.append((index, pagenumber, x0, x1, y0, y1, contenido)) 
    
        pageraux = page

#Crear dataframe con toda la data cruda

df_RawDat = spark.createDataFrame(ArrayRawData, schemarawdata)

# crear parquet file
df_RawDat.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(path_sink)
